mapper.insert: insert into user_role ( role_name, role_state, cre_time, upd_time )values( #{role_name}, #{role_state}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select m.*,p.show_on_init,p.show_order from sys_menu m left join (select show_on_init,show_order,menu_id from menu_privilege where role_id=#{role_id}) p on p.menu_id=m.menu_id where m.menu_state=1

select m.*,p.show_on_init,p.show_order from sys_menu m left join (select show_on_init,show_order,menu_id from menu_privilege where role_id=#{role_id}) p on p.menu_id=m.menu_id where 1=1 order by p.show_order asc
mapper.insert: insert into menu_privilege ( menu_id, role_id, show_on_init, show_order, cre_time )values( #{menu_id}, #{role_id}, #{show_on_init}, #{show_order}, now() )
mapper.delete: delete from menu_privilege where role_id=#{role_id} and menu_id=#{menu_id}; delete from dashboard_app_config where app_id in (select app_id from sys_menu where app_id is not null and menu_id=#{menu_id});
